net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute

Interface AttributeWriteAltText

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Accessibility, AttributeReadAltText
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractImage, UiWidgetAdapterImage, UiWidgetImage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetImage, UiWidgetAdapterGwtImage, UiWidgetAdapterTest, UiWidgetAdapterTestCheckboxField, UiWidgetAdapterTestColorField, UiWidgetAdapterTestComposite, UiWidgetAdapterTestCompositeRegular, UiWidgetAdapterTestDateField, UiWidgetAdapterTestDoubleField, UiWidgetAdapterTestField, UiWidgetAdapterTestFileField, UiWidgetAdapterTestGridPanel, UiWidgetAdapterTestGridRow, UiWidgetAdapterTestIntegerField, UiWidgetAdapterTestLocalDateField, UiWidgetAdapterTestLocalTimeField, UiWidgetAdapterTestLongField, UiWidgetAdapterTestMenu, UiWidgetAdapterTestMenuBar, UiWidgetAdapterTestNumberField, UiWidgetAdapterTestOptionsField, UiWidgetAdapterTestSelectedValue, UiWidgetAdapterTestStringField, UiWidgetAdapterTestTabPanel, UiWidgetAdapterTestTree, UiWidgetImageGwt, UiWidgetImageTestImpl

    public interface AttributeWriteAltText
extends AttributeReadAltText
    This interface gives read and write access to the alternative text of an object.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
